description:
Chihaya announces to Hasebe that she`s his rival with regards to Lucy. With the group gathered around the Section Manger desk, an incredible thing happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beware of Next Week`s Unseen Danger
Gare aux dangers imprévus de la semaine prochaine
Raishuu no Mienai Kiken ni Youchuui
来週の 見えない危険に 要注意
